indexPageText.title: Writers of Belarus
indexPageText.partOne: The end of the 19th and especially the beginning of the 20th century marked the development of Belarusian literature as a completely separate subject, which used the modern version of the Belarusian language. Many well-known works in a completely different light, and also demonstrate the unique values that Belarusian literature of that time can offer the reader from the free world.
indexPageText.partTwo: Modern literary life is concentrated in Minsk. The publishing house, which arose in 2014 as a private initiative of some Belarusian publishers and authors, is aimed at popularizing Belarusian literature and its wide distribution.
